about_the_game:
Set in a unique dark fantasy world, Wheelborn Demo is a short open world adventure that can be finished in about 10 minutes,
but it has much more extra content to offer!

--- IMPORTANT! ---
This demo is NOT the first part of the full game. It is a stand-alone small game with similar storyline. It is not completely polished and missing some features and mechanics of the full game, but you can totally enjoy it independently. It is like a bite-size manifest of what yet to come.

.

- Unique dark fantasy world building
- Hand-crafted art, design and textures
- Simple and basic but responsive and fun combat
- 5 levels of evil progression
- Old school real exploration, set in a tiny but full of secrets open world


Wheelborn is the name of a race of intelligent car-like creatures, who are born from wheels - When one Wheelborn dies, four new Wheelborns will hatch from each of its wheels. In a way, in this world only death brings new life.

The great kingdom of Wheelaria is in ruins, taken over by corrupted monstrous Wheelborns - The Wildlings.
You control Arback, a brave warrior whose mission is to kill Wildlings and collect their wheels...

Fight, explore, find secrets, enjoy a unique world building.. and choose your path - will you be the good noble warrior or will you become even worse and more cruel then your enemies!

Controls (Mouse and Keyboard) :

Look Around: Mouse
Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Speed Boost: Shift
Attack: RightMouseButton
Heavy Attack: LeftMouseButton
Interact: E

Gamepad:

Look Around: Right Stick
Movement: Left Stick
Jump: Button South
Speed Boost: Right Shoulder
Attack: Button West
Heavy Attack: Button East
Interact: Button North


Who is Mr. Llun?

content_descriptors.notes: Wheelborn is a dark fantasy themed game. Although it might look cute and childish to some, it has some fantasy violence and mature themes.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: M1, Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 14.5
  • Processor: M1, Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Wheelborn Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Reducing resolution in settings might help on lower end PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Wheelborn is a short indie exploration beat ‘em up adventure, set in a world where the Wheelborn, car-like creatures with a unique lifecycle, face corruption.
